column4: HI Guys as a newby to Ubuntu 7.04, I have installed avg from their web site ( avg75fld-r45-a0973.i386.deb, it installed automatically, however it wont update says I havent permissiomn, and doesnt auto start, if I start it manually its in tha accessories folder it seems to run ok, any ideas how to get it to update and self start on boot up?
you do not need an antivirus
why not platman
you will not get any viruses. all the viruses in the wild are mostly windows viruses
ok as a windows long time user that makes me nervous
former windows users are obsessed with anti-virus
just let it go and enjoy the extra ram
yes and I know why, do I not need anti spyware neither
nope
ok I will uninstall the avg then thanks for the info
no prob. just enjoy USING your computer, not maintaining it
ok thanks for that
parmenion: only one. you can still send and receive viruses, they just cant run in your system
so you can infect all of your windows friends
flannel: the way i figure is that considering the amount of enterprise servers running linux and no one writes viruses for the,
the,* ever wonder why?
Platman should I uninstall the firewall as well?
keep the firewall
that's the only one you should keep
ok
again though I have to start it manually
i dont use any firewalls personally, i only keep pr0n and music on my computer
